decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - Any advertisement displayed, and any site used for the display of advertisments, shall be maintained in a clean and tidy condition to the reasonable satisfaction of the local planning  authourity
Condition : 2 - Any structure or hoarding erected or used principally for the purpose of displaying advertisements shall be maintained in a safe condition
Condition : 3 - Where an advertisement is required under these regulations to be removed, the removal shall be carried out to the reasonable satisfaction of the local planning authority
Condition : 4 - No advertisement is to be displayed without the permission of the owner of the site or any other person with an interest in the site entitled to grant permission

Condition : 5 - No advertisement shall be sited of displayed so as to obscure, or hinder the ready interpretation of, any road traffic sign, railway signal or aid to navigation by water or air, or so as otherwise to render hazardous the use of any highway, railway, waterway or aerodrome (civil or military).

Condition : 6 - No development shall stake place until details of the level of luminance for the tower have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority and such levels of luminance shall be implemented as agreed on first use of the tower and thereafter permanently retained unless otherwise agreed in writing be the LPA.
description: Installation of free standing double sided internally illuminated monolith tower sign
